Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefits

When using a weapon with a sling attached, the character gains a +2 to single shot attacks using that weapon. The character may not use this feat if using a bipod or tripod to steady the weapon.
system.summary: +2 to single shots with weapon sling
